Line.Code: ElseIf (Convert.ToInt32(Me.Utility.Dlookup("members", "count(*)", String.Concat(New String() { "member_login ='", Me.Login_name.Text, "' and member_password='", CCUtility.Quote(Me.Login_password.Text), "'" }))) > 0) Then

ElseIf (Convert.ToInt32(Me.Utility.Dlookup("members", "count(*)", String.Concat(New String() { "member_login ='", Me.Login_name.Text, "' and member_password='", CCUtility.Quote(Me.Login_password.Text), "'" }))) > 0) Then
Public Function Dlookup(ByVal table As String, ByVal field As String, ByVal sWhere As String) As String
Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = New OleDbCommand(String.Concat(New String() { "SELECT ", field, " FROM ", table, " WHERE ", sWhere }), Me.Connection).ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.SingleRow)
Dim reader As OleDbDataReader = New OleDbCommand(String.Concat(New String() { "SELECT ", field, " FROM ", table, " WHERE ", sWhere }), Me.Connection).ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.SingleRow)

Me.Session.Item("UserID") = Convert.ToInt32(Me.Utility.Dlookup("members", "member_id", String.Concat(New String() { "member_login ='", Me.Login_name.Text, "' and member_password='", CCUtility.Quote(Me.Login_password.Text), "'" })))

Me.Session.Item("UserID") = Convert.ToInt32(Me.Utility.Dlookup("members", "member_id", String.Concat(New String() { "member_login ='", Me.Login_name.Text, "' and member_password='", CCUtility.Quote(Me.Login_password.Text), "'" })))
